request.description:
# Auth Signup

This endpoint allows users to sign up by providing their username, email, password, and password confirmation.

## Request Body

- `username` (string, required): The username of the user.
    
- `email` (string, required): The email address of the user.
    
- `password` (string, required): The password for the account.
    
- `passwordConfirm` (string, required): Confirmation of the password.
    

## Response

### Success 200 OK

In case of a successful signup, the response will have a status code of 200 and a JSON object with user details.

### Failure 500 Internal Server Error

If there is an internal server error, the response will have a status code of 500 along with an error status and message in the JSON format.

### Validation Errors

In case of validation errors, the response will include details about the specific validation errors along with the appropriate status code.
